website_summaries.verdict: A durable table that's perfect for preschool and kindergarten classrooms. And because it includes 4 stools, it's also a good value.
pros: Crafted of strong bentwood with a smooth finish
20.5-inch height is perfect for preschoolers and small children
Not overly challenging to put together
cons: The downside of the painted stools is that the finish is prone to chips
Screws and bolts occasionally need tightening

customer_reviews.title: Great Table and Stools
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful table and stools for my 18 month old grandson. Company was very responsive when one of the table legs arrived cracked. Replaced very quickly in time for Christmas. Seem very sturdy and I am sure they will get many hours of use. So glad I found this company.
customer_reviews.author: vicky

customer_reviews.title: Great profile, must tighten bolts frequently
customer_reviews.text: I love the minimalist profile of this set. I would have preferred the stools to be all the same color as the table (or another neutral). We do have to tighten the bolts holding the legs to the seat frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Summery

customer_reviews.title: Some chairs were delivered chipped & scratched
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I expected a slighty better product. The paint is bad with some of the chairs delivered with chips and scratches. The table has green paint stained into it when it's supposed to be just the natural wood color. So far, it seems sturdy. I'll update in 6 months to let you know how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: EVB

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My two kids love the table and stools. It’s the perfect size to fit in the living room and for them to eat and do different activities at. My only complaint is the paint on the stools. I have had this for less than a month and the colored paint has scratched and scraped right off.
customer_reviews.author: kara osborne

customer_reviews.title: WE love it
customer_reviews.text: My child loves it , its fun to play on safe and easy to assemble. Made from quality material.
customer_reviews.author: YChilds

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great asset to my library, my students love it!
customer_reviews.author: MicroNerd5

customer_reviews.title: Great kids table
customer_reviews.text: Solidly made, bent plywood, basic design. Easy to assemble and very durable finish. Probably best for kids younger than 7 years-old based on size.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good kid furniture
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble. paint on stools chipped when we stacked them. the kids love that it's their size
customer_reviews.author: Sam E

customer_reviews.title: Real wood!!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks very high quality. Is standing up to my nephew!
customer_reviews.author: M N

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: I like the way the chairs stack neatly underneath when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: gnk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set! Our little one loves it and it's easy to clean!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table, but paint chips easily
customer_reviews.text: I love ECR4Kids products because they are durable and designed for long term use by multiple children. My daycare kids love this table and stools, and I like them being backless so they don't get tempted to lean the chairs backwards. The stools stack and slide under the table for easy storage if you need to make more space. I love that the surfaces are smooth, but I did notice the colored part of the seating was chipping in a few places within a few days. Other than that it's been a great set!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Convenience
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient for students to do their activities sitting or standing.
customer_reviews.author: Winsome Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The ECR4Kids Bentwood Table and Stool Set for Kids is great. I'm no structural engineer so can't say for sure, but I believe the curved or arched nature of the supports makes this set much more durable than our other sets we've had. This engineering goes into the stools and chairs, so everything is rock solid. Easy to set up and use quickly. The set almost has a museum look, maybe not even "almost" but looks like they would fit in a museum. Good quality set.
customer_reviews.author: Atomic Tofu

customer_reviews.title: Kiddie Table
customer_reviews.text: This is a good sturdy table that's the right size for my nieces who are 6 and almost-5. Hopefully they can still use it for a couple more years. Like a lot of build-it-yourself furniture (like from that Swedish place) it comes with an Allen wrench for you to assemble yourself. Honestly I probably have a dozen of those wrenches by now. Anyway, this is a lot classier than some cheap plastic table too.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Fraser

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY kids' furniture at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This set is very well made, with smooth finishes, no rough spots, and a nice thick coverage of color and varnish. It was very easy to put together, and is the perfect size for kids from 2-6 or so, depending on size. The thing that captured my attention the most is the look--you can see it's high-quality, and sturdy. I expected Ikea-type quality, but this is far better, and far more sturdy. I highly, highly recommend this for kids rooms or, in my case, grandma's playroom :)
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: Table Time
customer_reviews.text: ECR4Kids Natural Bentwood Table and 4 School Stools A well made and sturdy product--adorable when set up. It comes flat packed and has to be put together. Although the stools are strong, they are made for little ones. An adult will eventually loosen the legs (and that will lead to broken stools) if sat upon.
customer_reviews.author: sunday

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Table for Classroom and Home Use
customer_reviews.text: Love the ECR4Kids Natural Bentwood Table and 4 School Stools. The sleek design looks great in the classroom. Quality construction. Took it to school today and the first graders used the Allen wrench and put it together themselves. So excited to help construct the table and stools. This is a wonderful product for classroom, and home. The kids love it, and so does the teacher.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Mapes

customer_reviews.title: Worth half what we paid
customer_reviews.text: We paid over $100 for this, I guess we would be happy with it if we'd paid $40-50, but it is a flimsy thing with a shoddy paint job. This is all you get for your money now.
customer_reviews.author: Empath in Arlington

customer_reviews.title: Almost great
customer_reviews.text: This would be a perfect little set, but the paint on the stools chips quickly and easily. Should come with touch-up paint or just be better paint. Kids of course don't notice, but it really is too bad. We gave it as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: kwhome

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Paint chips easily off of the stools, and be careful of over tightening the screws, it will crack the wood. My janitor had to re-drill new holes for one of the table legs. A screw had loosened and over-enlarged the hole, making it unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Evangeline

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was a breeze- screws all match and were easily worked into place using a standard allen wrench. Wood is of good quality. Table and stools are sturdy. Stools stack very nicely beneath the table when not in use. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: April M. Steenburgh

customer_reviews.title: Solid, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This set of small stools and table works well as an art station for little ones. The wood is solid, and attached with just a handful of sturdy screws (provided with an allen wrench). The pictures are accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Bukkene Bruse

customer_reviews.title: Adorable seating and table
customer_reviews.text: The kids love their new table and chairs. A wonderful place for them to play, color and have their afternoon snacks. Assembly was easy and everything was sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Parker-Moore Family

product_meta.title: ECR4Kids Bentwood Table and Stool Set for Kids, Assorted
product_meta.description: Color:Assorted| Size:5-Piece Table and Stool SetThe ECR4Kids Bentwood Table and Stools Set is just the place for little ones to meet up for story time, manipulative play, and more. Perfect for home, daycare, or school use, the contemporary design includes one durable round bentwood table paired with four 12-inch bentwood stools for quality time with a buddy and a puzzle. Both the table and stools feature an attractive natural finish, and the stools come complete with four colorful tops so little ones can pick their favorite. The stools slide under the table for storage when not in use. Featuring rounded edges for safety, the table measures 27.5 inches round and 20.5 inches tall, while the stools each measure 10 inches round and 12 inches high. Adult assembly required. Intended for use by children ages 2 and older. ECR4Kids has achieved GREENGUARD [GOLD] Certification for meeting or exceeding standards for low emissions into indoor air during product usage. With a concentration on the Pre K-12 sector, ECR4Kids offers a wide range of products from tables, chairs and desks to cots, mats and a variety of storage cases in solid wood as well as scratch resistant double-sided laminate.
feature_bullets: Cozy Sitting Space — set of four round stools and a table creates an inviting space in classrooms, daycares and homes
Versatile Furniture Set — perfect for puzzles, games, group activities, arts and crafts, reading, writing and more
Sleek Stools — set has one stool each in red, blue, green and yellow; stoos can be stored underneath or on top of table when not in use
Built to Last — constructed with durable bentwood with a natural finish; backed by a 2-year limited warranty
Certified and Safe — GREENGUARD[GOLD] Certified for minimal chemical emissions into indoor air; features rounded edges for safety
Dimensions — table measures 27.5" W x 27.5" D x 20.5X H; stools measure 10" W x 10" D x 12" H each
Ready to Assemble — some adult assembly required

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars51 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
